messages.subject: Decorating Porn Addicts Unite!
messages.msgSnippet: I bet that caught your attention. Ever since we bought our house a couple years ago, we ve become addicted to what I refer to as Decorating Porn: Trading
messages.messageBody:
I bet that caught your attention.

Ever since we bought our house a couple years ago, we've become addicted to
what I refer to as Decorating Porn: Trading Spaces, DIY tv, etc.

I found the coolest thing! Check this out:
http://shopping.discovery.com/stores/servlet/ProductDisplay?catalogId=10000&storeId=10000&langId=-1&productId=521
23&rel_productId=52119

It's a Trading Spaces Dollhouse that has all kinds of decorating projects,
including designing fabrics, weaving a hamper, molding food... I just thought
it was very cool.
Kathryn


Come to the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference August 27-29 in Peabody, MA!
For more information, go to www.LiveandLearnConference.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
